entities.name: viktor krum
entities.description: Viktor Krum is a Quidditch player who pulled out of the dive at the last second.

entities.name: aidan lynch
entities.description: Aidan Lynch hit the ground with a dull thud and was examined by mediwizards.

entities.name: mr. weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley reacted to Viktor Krum's feinting.

entities.name: bagman
entities.description: Bagman yelled that it was time-out and mediwizards were needed.

entities.name: charlie
entities.description: Charlie reassured Ginny that Aidan Lynch would be okay.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny was looking horror-struck at the scene.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry used his Omnioculars to replay and examine the incident.

relationships.description: Viktor Krum's feinting led to Aidan Lynch hitting the ground.
Bagman yelled that it was time-out and mediwizards were needed to examine Aidan Lynch.
Charlie reassured Ginny that Aidan Lynch would be okay.
Harry used his Omnioculars to replay and examine the incident involving Viktor Krum.
